output_list.criticism: The mintToken function does not have any overflow check when minting tokens to an arbitrary user. This allows the owner to mint arbitrary amounts of tokens to any user, causing a integer overflow in the user's balance and potential exploit.
The _transfer function does not have any overflow check when transferring tokens. This allows a user to overflow the receiver's balance, causing a denial of service to the receiver.

The distributeToken function does not have any overflow check when distributing tokens to a list of users. This allows the owner to distribute arbitrary amounts of tokens to users, causing a integer overflow in the user's balance and potential exploit.
The burn function does not have any overflow check when burning tokens. This allows a user to burn arbitrary amounts of tokens, causing a integer overflow in the total supply and potential exploit.

The burnFrom function does not have any overflow check when burning tokens from a user. This allows a user to burn arbitrary amounts of tokens from another user, causing a integer overflow in the user's balance and potential exploit.
